Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bac7(1-23) (Synthetic AMPs, N-terminal fragment of Bac7, Arg-rich, Pro-rich; PrAMPs, UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (78.26%) tomini-ChBac7.5NbetaP: 43%; R: 39%. GRAVY: -1.81; Mol Wt: 2881.534; Mol formula: C131H222N50O24; mol ex coeff: 0.Activity: active against E. coli ATCC 25922 or ML-35 (MIC 1 uM), S. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028 (MIC 2 uM), S. marcescens ATCC8100 (MIC 4 uM), S.aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC >128 uM). Updated 8/2024
Literature Information.Author: Benincasa M, Scocchi M, Podda E, Skerlavaj B, Dolzani L, Gennaro R. 2004
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial activity of Bac7 fragments against drug-resistant clinical isolates
